welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Crowley, where Southern charm and hospitality await you! Known for its rich history and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Meacham Field Airport is for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport is exclusively for private flights and their passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights at Fort Worth Alliance Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available in all terminals and is free for the first 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redbird Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redbird Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free with a valid boarding pass.
